mapper.select: select c.course_uuid, c.course_name, c.course_img, c.course_date from course c, teacher_course tc where #{teacherUuid} = tc.teacher_uuid and tc.course_uuid = c.course_uuid order by c.course_date DESC
select * from course c where c.course_uuid not in (select tc.course_uuid from teacher_course tc where tc.teacher_uuid = #{teacherUuid}) order by c.course_date DESC
